languages.text: "Быть может и так, шерин. Вот только я что-то заскучала по родной вони доков, милашке Окти с ее баром да каменному взору Великого, что наблюдает за тобой с любой точки Футфола. По дому тоскую, понимаете?" {n}Ласковая улыбка слетает с лица Джай, оставляя нагую мрачность.{/n} "Береженного дважды Великий и в третий раз сбережет, шерин. Я не хочу рисковать жизнями своих людей".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может и так, шерин. Вот только я что-то заскучала по родной вони доков, милашке Окти с ее баром да каменному взору Великого, что наблюдает за тобой с любой точки Футфола. По дому тоскую, понимате?" {n}Ласковая улыбка слетает с лица Джай, оставляя нагую мрачность.{/n} "Береженного дважды Великий и в третий раз сбережет, шерин. Я не хочу рисковать жизнями своих людей".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."
languages.original_text: "Быть может и так, шерин. Я не хочу рисковать жизнями своих людей".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そう、はったりかもしれないわ、シャリーン。でも、あたしは波止場の懐かしい匂い、最愛のオクティと彼女のバー、そしてフットフォールのどこにいてもあんたを見守ってくれるエグザルテッド・ワンの石のような視線さえも恋しく思ってるの。ホームシックってやつよ、わかるかしら？」{n}ジェイの顔からほのかな笑みが消え、あからさまに暗い表情が残された。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンは、自らを助ける者を助けるって言うでしょう。そしてあたしは人々の命を危険にさらしたくないの」
languages.original_text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."

traits.locale_text: 「そう、はったりかもしれないわ、シャリーン。でも、あたしは波止場の懐かしい匂い、最愛のオクティと彼女のバー、そしてフットフォールのどこにいてもあんたを見守ってくれるエグザルテッド・ワンの石のような視線さえも恋しく思ってるの。ホームシックってやつよ、わかるかしら？」{n}ジェイの顔からほのかな笑みが消え、あからさまに暗い表情が残された。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンは、自らを助ける者を助けるって言うでしょう。そしてあたしは人々の命を危険にさらしたくないの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许确实是虚张声势，亲爱的，不过我很想念那个码头熟悉的臭味。我想念我亲爱的小奥和她的酒吧，甚至会想念至高无上的神皇雕像，还有它高高在上，审视落脚港众生的目光。我想家了，你明白吗？”{n}婕伊脸上温柔的笑容消失了，只剩下不加掩饰的凄楚。{/n}“至高无上的神皇会帮助那些愿意自助的人，亲爱的。我不想拿我身边的人的性命来冒险。”
languages.original_text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."

traits.locale_text: “或许确实是虚张声势，亲爱的，不过我很想念那个码头熟悉的臭味。我想念我亲爱的小奥和她的酒吧，甚至会想念至高无上的神皇雕像，还有它高高在上，审视落脚港众生的目光。我想家了，你明白吗？”{n}婕伊脸上温柔的笑容消失了，只剩下不加掩饰的凄楚。{/n}“至高无上的神皇会帮助那些愿意自助的人，亲爱的。我不想拿我身边的人的性命来冒险。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Y no le faltaría razón, shereen. Pero echo en falta el hedor de los muelles, a mi querida Octi y su bar e, incluso, la estoica mirada del Exaltado que te vigila allá donde vayas en Paso. Echo de menos mi hogar, ¿sabe?». {n}La tierna sonrisa desaparece del rostro de Jae, dando paso a una expresión claramente tenebrosa.{/n}«El Exaltado ayuda a quienes se ayudan a sí mismos, shereen. Y no quiero poner en riesgo la vida de mi gente».
languages.original_text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."

traits.locale_text: «Y no le faltaría razón, shereen. Pero echo en falta el hedor de los muelles, a mi querida Octi y su bar e, incluso, la estoica mirada del Exaltado que te vigila allá donde vayas en Paso. Echo de menos mi hogar, ¿sabe?». {n}La tierna sonrisa desaparece del rostro de Jae, dando paso a una expresión claramente tenebrosa.{/n}«El Exaltado ayuda a quienes se ayudan a sí mismos, shereen. Y no quiero poner en riesgo la vida de mi gente».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est possible, shereen. Mais j'avoue que la puanteur des docks me manque, tout comme le bar de ma chère Octy. J'ai même envie de retrouver la statue de l'Exalté qui surveille de son regard de pierre l'arrivée de chaque visiteur de Castel. J'ai le mal de la station, vous voyez bien. » {n}Le petit sourire qui s'était esquissé sur le visage de Jae est bien vite remplacé par une expression morne.{/n} « Mais comme on dit, "Aide-toi et l'Exalté t'aidera". Et je n'ai pas envie de jouer avec la vie des miens, shereen. »
languages.original_text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."

traits.locale_text: « C'est possible, shereen. Mais j'avoue que la puanteur des docks me manque, tout comme le bar de ma chère Octy. J'ai même envie de retrouver la statue de l'Exalté qui surveille de son regard de pierre l'arrivée de chaque visiteur de Castel. J'ai le mal de la station, vous voyez bien. » {n}Le petit sourire qui s'était esquissé sur le visage de Jae est bien vite remplacé par une expression morne.{/n} « Mais comme on dit, "Aide-toi et l'Exalté t'aidera". Et je n'ai pas envie de jouer avec la vie des miens, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Könnte es, Shereen. Aber ich vermisse den vertrauten Gestank der Docks, Darling Octy und ihre Bar und sogar den versteinerten Blick des Erhabenen, der einen überall auf Footfall verfolgt. Ich habe Heimweh, versteht Ihr?" {n}Das sanfte Lächeln schwindet aus Jaes Gesicht, und zurück bleibt ungeschönte Kälte.{/n} "Der Erhabene hilft denen, die sich selbst helfen, Shereen. Und ich will das Leben meiner Leute nicht aufs Spiel setzen."
languages.original_text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."

traits.locale_text: "Könnte es, Shereen. Aber ich vermisse den vertrauten Gestank der Docks, Darling Octy und ihre Bar und sogar den versteinerten Blick des Erhabenen, der einen überall auf Footfall verfolgt. Ich habe Heimweh, versteht Ihr?" {n}Das sanfte Lächeln schwindet aus Jaes Gesicht, und zurück bleibt ungeschönte Kälte.{/n} "Der Erhabene hilft denen, die sich selbst helfen, Shereen. Und ich will das Leben meiner Leute nicht aufs Spiel setzen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Olabilir şirinim. Fakat limanın kesif kokusunu, canım Octy'nin barını, hatta Görkemli'nin Binliman'da attığın her adımda hissedilen bakışlarını özlemedim desem yalan olur. Memleket hasreti işte, anlasana." {n}Jae'ın yüzündeki nazik gülümseme, yerini kasvetli bir ifadeye bırakıyor.{/n} "Kendine hayrı olmayana Görkemli'den hayır gelmez şirinim. Dostlarımın hayatını riske atmak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "It could, shereen. But I've been missing the familiar stench of the docks, and darling Octy and her bar, and even the stony gaze of the Exalted One that watches over you wherever you are on Footfall. I'm homesick, you see?" {n}The tender smile vanishes from Jae's face, leaving a nakedly bleak expression behind.{/n} "The Exalted One helps those who help themselves, shereen. And I don't want to risk the lives of my people."

traits.locale_text: "Olabilir şirinim. Fakat limanın kesif kokusunu, canım Octy'nin barını, hatta Görkemli'nin Binliman'da attığın her adımda hissedilen bakışlarını özlemedim desem yalan olur. Memleket hasreti işte, anlasana." {n}Jae'ın yüzündeki nazik gülümseme, yerini kasvetli bir ifadeye bırakıyor.{/n} "Kendine hayrı olmayana Görkemli'den hayır gelmez şirinim. Dostlarımın hayatını riske atmak istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
